member.name: T:SvgElements.PathElement
member.summary: Represents a SVG path element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddPoints(System.Double[])
member.summary: Adds an absolute move clause and one or more absolute line clauses to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: An array of y and y coordinates.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddPoints(System.Boolean,System.Double[])
member.summary: Adds an absolute move or line clause and one or more absolute line clauses to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: true, if the first clause is a move; otherwise, false.
An array of y and y coordinates.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddMove(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds an absolute move clause M {x} {y} to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: Absolute x-coordinate.
Absolute y-coordinate.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddMoveRelative(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds an relative move clause m {x} {y} to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: Relative x-coordinate.
Relative y-coordinate.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddLine(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds an absolute line clause L {x} {y} to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: Absolute x-coordinate.
Absolute y-coordinate.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddLineRelative(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds an relative line clause l {x} {y} to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: Relative x-coordinate.
Relative y-coordinate.

member.name: M:SvgElements.PathElement.AddLine(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds an absolute move and a line clause M {x} {y} L {x} {y} to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.
member.param: Absolute x-coordinate of begin of line.
Absolute y-coordinate of begin of line.
Absolute x-coordinate of end of line.
Relative y-coordinate of end of line.

member.summary: Adds a move clause and an circular arc clause to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds a move clause and an elliptic arc clause to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds a line clause and an arc clause to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds an arc clause without a move or line clause before to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds a move clause and quadratic spline clause to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds a move clause and quadratic spline clause to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Adds a close clause Z to the d-Attribute of this path element and returns this element.

member.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of one of the corners of the rectangle. Default is X=0.

member.summary: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of one of the corners of the rectangle. Default is Y=0.

member.summary: Gets or sets the width value for the viewbox attribute. This value is optional; to enable the viewbox attribute the properties , , and must be set.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElement.ViewboxHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height value for the viewbox attribute. This value is optional; to enable the viewbox attribute the properties , , and must be set.

member.name: T:SvgElements.SvgElementBase
member.summary: Base class for all classes that represent SVG elements.

member.summary: Returns an XML-element built from the properties of this SVG-element object.
member.returns: The built from the properties of this SVG-element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Cd(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Formats a double value with a decimal dot as needed in numerical attribute of a SVG element.
member.returns: A string containing the formatted double value.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the id attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Class
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the class attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.CommentsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that a comment associated with this is to be displayed.
member.value: true, when the comment is to be displayed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional string value for a comment to be placed in this element.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the stroke attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.StrokeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the stroke-width attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.StrokeDashArray
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the stroke-dasharray attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value for the fill attribute.

member.name: P:SvgElements.SvgElementBase.Transform
member.summary: Gets the value of the transform attribute, built from the specified clauses.

member.name: T:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1
member.summary: Base class for all classes that represent SVG elements.

member.summary: Sets the value for the id attribute and returns this element.

member.summary: Sets the value for the class attribute and returns this element.

member.summary: Sets the value for the stroke attribute and returns this element.

member.summary: Sets the values for the stroke-width attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.WithStrokeDashArray(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the stroke-dasharray attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.WithFill(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the fill property with an fill attribute value containg a color name or Hex RGB-value and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.WithFillURL(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the fill property with a fill attribute value containg a URL expression with the passed fill URL and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddScale(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a scale clause with individual scale factors for x and y to the transform attribute and returns this element.
member.param: Scale factor for x.
Scale factor for y.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddScale(System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a scale clause with equal scale factors for x and y to the transform attribute and returns this element.
member.param: Scale factor for x and y.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddRotate(System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a rotate clause to the transform attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddRotate(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a rotate clause to the transform attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddTranslate(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a transalate clause to the transform attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.ReverseY(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating that a transform atrribute provides a inversion of the y-coordinate.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.WithComment(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the property and return this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.ToString
member.summary: Returns an XML-element built from the properties of this SVG-element object as string. If the property contains a value and comments are enbled a XML Comment element is placed before the XML-element.
member.returns: A string containing built from the properties of this SVG-element preceeded by a element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.SvgElementBase`1.AddAttribute(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an attribute with specified name and value if the parameter is true and the specified value is not null.
member.param: The element the attribute is to added to.
The name of the attributre.
The value for the attribute.
true, if the attribute is to be added; otherwise; false.

member.name: T:SvgElements.TextElement
member.summary: Represents a SVG text element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a . The stroke property is set to "none" by default.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithXY(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets values for the x and y attributes and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithFont(System.String,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the values for the attributes font-family, font-size, font-weight, and font-style attributes. and returns this element.
member.param: The name of the font family or empty if the font-family attribute is not to be set.
The font size zero if the font-size attribute is not to be set.
true if the font-weight="bold" attribute is to be set; otherwise, false.
true if the font-style="italic" attribute is to be set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithAlignmentBaseline(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the alignment-baseline attribute and returns this element.

remarks.para: The SVG text element does not support the alignment-baseline attribute specifying the attribute forces inserting a tspan element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithTextAnchor(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the text-anchor attribute and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithTspans(System.Collections.Generic.IList{SvgElements.TspanElement})
member.summary: Adds a list of object to the list property and returns this element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElement.WithValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the SVG text element and returns this element.

member.name: T:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1
member.summary: Base class for the classes that represent SVG text and tspan elements.

member.name: T:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.LengthAdjustType
member.summary: Defines valid values for the property, i.e. values for the length-adjust attribute.

member.name: F:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.LengthAdjustType.None
member.summary: No length adjust, attribute will not be assigned.

member.name: F:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.LengthAdjustType.Spacing
member.summary: Stretch using spacing only

member.name: F:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.LengthAdjustType.SpacingAndGlyphs
member.summary: Stretch using spacing and glyphs.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the text value for this . The list of children that were previously added is cleared.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.LengthAdjust
member.summary: How the text is stretched or compressed to fit the width defined by the textLength attribute.
member.value: Value type: spacing|spacingAndGlyphs; Default value: spacing; Animatable: yes

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or set a font name for this . If the font name is set a font-family attribute is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Bold
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating bold text for this . If this property is true a font-weight="bold" attribute is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Italic
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating italic text for this . If this property is true a font-style="italic" attribute is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or set the font size for this . If this property is not equal to zero font-size attribute with the specified value is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.TextAnchor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for an text-anchor attribute for this . This is used is used to align a text in text direction.
member.value: Valid values are: start | middle | end.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Underline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that text is underlined in this . If this property is true a text-decoration="underline" attribute is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Overstrike
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that text is overstriked in this . A respective text-decoration is not available in SVG.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Strikethrough
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that text is striked through in this . If this property is true a text-decoration="line-through" attribute is created.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.Tspans
member.summary: Gets the list of child tspans of this .

member.name: M:SvgElements.TextElementBase`1.AddTextContent(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Adds tspan elements or text value.

member.name: T:SvgElements.TspanElement
member.summary: Represents a SVG tspan element.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TspanElement.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a that represents an in-line tspan, to be placed after the preceding tspan, i.e. no location is specified.

member.name: M:SvgElements.TspanElement.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a that represents a tspan that is to be placed on a new line.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.CodePage
member.summary: This property is currently not used.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.Alignment
member.summary: This property is currently not used.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.Height
member.summary: This property is currently not used.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.Width
member.summary: This property is currently not used.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.SlantAngle
member.summary: This property is currently not used.

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.AlignmentBaseline
member.summary: Gets or sets a string to create a alignment-baseline attribute. It specifies how the text is aligned with respect to its parent.

value.para: auto | baseline | before-edge | text-before-edge | middle | central | after-edge | text-after-edge | ideographic | alphabetic | hanging | mathematical | top | center | bottom

member.name: P:SvgElements.TspanElement.ParentElement
member.summary: Gets the parent element if this was created as a child of an element.
member.value: A or null when the element was not created as a child of another element.

member.name: T:SvgElements.UseElement
member.summary: Represents SVG use element.

member.name: P:SvgElements.UseElement.X
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional x-coordinate of the location for the content referenced by this . Default is x = 0.

member.name: P:SvgElements.UseElement.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional y-coordinate of the location for the content referenced by this . Default is y = 0.

member.name: P:SvgElements.UseElement.GroupId
member.summary: Gets or sets the the ID of the SVG group to be referenced and returns this element.
member.value: A string containing the ID of the SVG group as defined by the id-Attribute.

member.name: M:SvgElements.UseElement.WithXY(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the location (, ) for the content referenced by this and returns this element.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the location.
The y-coordinate of the location.

member.name: M:SvgElements.UseElement.WithGroupId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the , i.e. the ID of the SVG group to be referenced and returns this element.
member.param: The ID of a SVG group as defined by the id-Attribute.
